detectors.description:
FiatTokenV1._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FiatTokenV1__1.sol#749-764) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = balances[from].sub(value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FiatTokenV1__1.sol#761)
	- balances[to] = balances[to].add(value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FiatTokenV1__1.sol#762)
